humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient's pathology report indicates that metastatic carcinoma was found in 6 out of 23 lymph nodes (6/23) from the right axillary content. Based on the new rules provided, this corresponds to N3 stage as per the AJCC staging system.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient's pathologic N stage is N3 because metastatic carcinoma was found in 6 out of 23 axillary lymph nodes (6/23) and in 1 out of 3 level 3 (right) lymph nodes (1/3). This information is found in sections E and F of the gross description.
